title: Introducing: Casper Cult
content: Yet another dreamy, electronic act hailing from Australia, Casper Cult jokingly (perhaps) list their influences as La Dispute and Miley Cyrus… Comprised of Dylan Hill and a so far anonymous female friend, this is some real nostalgia inducing pop, sounding so sleek and perfectly produced. Put these on a decent sound system, turn it up loud, close your eyes, and hey, maybe summer will arrive a little earlier than expected. Check out Endless Nightmare and Industrial Love below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
